text:
Cotton was auctioned for Rs. 1.5 crore at the Konganapuram branch of the Tiruchengode Agricultural Producers Cooperative Society on Saturday.

While DCH variety fetched a price between Rs. 5,400 and Rs. 6,150 per bag, and Surabi variety fetched a price between Rs. 4,400 and Rs. 5,020. More than 8,000 bags of cotton were auctioned for Rs. 1.5 crores on the occasion, society sources said.
title: Cotton auction fetches Rs. 1.5 crore
